question: Question_05_(b)
sols:
Here we will be using the chain rule:

\[\displaystyle
( p(q(x)) )' = p'(q(x)) \cdot q'(x)\]

Here we have that

\[\displaystyle
p(x) = e^x \quad q(x) = \sqrt{x}\]

And so

\begin{align*}
g'(x) &= p'(q(x)) \cdot q'(x) \\
&= e^{\sqrt{x}} \left( \frac{1}{2\sqrt{x}} \right) \\
&= \frac{e^{\sqrt{x}}}{2\sqrt{x}}
\end{align*}
